summary:
Major League Soccer (MLS) is the top soccer league in the United States and Canada, with 29 teams. It was started in 1993 and began playing in 1996. After some early struggles, the league grew popular with new stadiums, big-name players, and TV deals.

MLS has a long season from February to October, with 18 teams competing in the playoffs. The LA Galaxy have won the most championships (MLS Cups). The league is unique as it doesn't promote or relegate teams like most soccer leagues.
title: Major League Soccer
